page.title: 13 CONFERENCE CENTRE
page.content: Harrogate's most modern landmark is the Multi-Million pound International Centre on Kings Road.The Centre Includes a 2000 seat Conference auditorium/concert hall,foyers,bars and lounges.There is underground parking,shops and an office block.Next to the centre is the international hotel,making Harrogate centre one of the best equipped conference buildings in europe.The centre attracts much trade to the town but some locals are critical of it for the following reasons:rates have been increased to pay for it;more trade produces parking problems;the futuristic design of the centre dose'nt match the Victorian buildings which surround it.
